channel.title: CVE Feed for Avaya -- Avaya Aura Appliance Virtualization Platform Utilities
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Avaya -- Avaya Aura Appliance Virtualization Platform Utilities

item.title: CVE-2021-25653|2024-08-03T20:11:27.517Z -- avaya -- avaya%20aura%20appliance%20virtualization%20platform%20utilities
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability was discovered in Avaya Aura Appliance Virtualization Platform Utilities (AVPU) that may potentially allow a local user to escalate privileges. Affects 8.0.0.0 through 8.1.3.1 versions of AVPU.

item.title: CVE-2021-25652|2024-08-03T20:11:27.657Z -- avaya -- avaya%20aura%20appliance%20virtualization%20platform%20utilities
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability was discovered in the directory and file management of Avaya Aura Appliance Virtualization Platform Utilities (AVPU). This vulnerability may potentially allow any local user to access system functionality and configuration information that should only be available to a privileged user. Affects versions 8.0.0.0 through 8.1.3.1 of AVPU.
